SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: RegistrationAdapter
SimEntity.Comment:
This utility class serves as a Adapter between an entity and the scenario manager. If an entity has a "doRegisterTargetByAdapter" and or a "doRegisterSensorByAdapter" event this entity and this class is listening to it it will pass the information to a RegistrationAdapter.
The most common use of this utility is to group common entities in graphical form in the assembly editor. See BehaviorLibraries/Locations/PearlHarbor.xml for an exaample implementation

Event.name: RegisterTargetWithAdapter
Event.Comment: Listens to this event in a connected class and passes the argument to a RegistrationAdapter

Argument.name: target
Argument.Comment: The target being registered by Adapter

Event.name: RegisterSensorWithAdapter
Event.Comment: Listens to this event in a connected class and passes the argument to a RegistrationAdapter

Argument.name: sensor
Argument.Comment: The sensor being registered using this Adapter

Argument.name: target
Argument.Comment: The target to Adapter to the adapter

Argument.name: sensor
Argument.Comment: The sensor to pass to the adapter
